attributes.action: I'm calling for the UK government to strengthen flyposting laws.
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government or parliament to do this since currently councils nationally only remove flypostings, we are seeing rampant narcotics flypostings across Havering and Basildon council owned areas (generally in Essex).


The government and parliament have the power to amend or create new bills, legislation.
attributes.background: I'd like the government to strengthen Flyposting laws across England and Wales due to an increasing occurance of Drugs, Political and Other flypostings Actions I'd like to see taken include Investigations launched into these drugs flypostings Custodial sentences and other sanctions for offenders.
